formula: a(n) ~ (2*n)! / r^(2*n+1), where r = 0.47191303538345047716706116017105574144998... is the root of the equation sinh(r)+tan(r) = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 05 2015
mathematica: nn = 20; Table[(CoefficientList[Series[ArcTanh[Sinh[x] + Tan[x]], {x, 0, 2*nn+1}], x] * Range[0, 2*nn+1]!)[[n]], {n, 2, 2*nn, 2}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 05 2015 *)
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
